title: ShareTO
description: A modern geolocation-based online marketplace for the sharing economy. Built using Angular, Java and MongoDB. Hosted on Google Cloud Platform.

title: ChessEngine
description: A Universal Chess Interface compatible chess engine, written in Python. Uses Minimax search with Alpha-Beta pruning and piece-square tables.

title: CustomArduino
description: A redesigned Arduino microcontroller board, from the open source spec. My first project with KiCad and soldering SMT components.

title: LM386 Amp
description: Op-amp circuit based on LM386 chip from Texas Instruments. Powerful enough to drive my electric guitar. Circuit design, layout, and soldering.

title: LearnBach
description: Python scripts for training a neural network to compose baroque-style keyboard music. Conversion between MIDI, .txt, and .csv. File retrieval with requests library.

title: DineSafe
description: Android app that uses restaurant inspection data from OpenData to recommend dining options for users. Java backend with IBM Cloudant as noSQL data store.
